VOTABLE.DESCRIPTION: VOTable generated from the original AAS Journal Machine Readable Table

RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Intrinsically Red Sources observed by Spitzer in the Galactic Mid-Plane (Robitaille T.P. et al.)

TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Red sources from the GLIMPSE II region with photometry at two epochs

FIELD.name: GLON
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Galatic longitude (1) These coordinates are set to the average position of the source at 4.5 and at 8.0 microns, as in Table 2.

FIELD.name: GLAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Galatic latitude (1) These coordinates are set to the average position of the source at 4.5 and at 8.0 microns, as in Table 2.

FIELD.name: RAdeg
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Right Ascension in decimal degrees (J2000) (1) These coordinates are set to the average position of the source at 4.5 and at 8.0 microns, as in Table 2.

FIELD.name: DEdeg
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Declination in decimal degrees (J2000) (1) These coordinates are set to the average position of the source at 4.5 and at 8.0 microns, as in Table 2.

FIELD.name: Var?
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Variablity flag (2) Y = The magnitudes for the two epochs differ by at least 0.3 mag at either (or both) 4.5 microns or 8.0 microns. N = Not variable.
